text: The Higher School of Mechanics of the Navy (in Spanish, Escuela Superior de Mecánica de la Armada, commonly known by its acronym ESMAMemoria Abierta: Escuela Superior de Mecánica de la Armada (ESMA)), was originally an educational facility of the Argentine Navy. It was used as an illegal, secret detention center during the Dirty War of military dictatorship. ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Buenos Aires
title: Navy Petty-Officers School
